name: Cat-Astro-Sea
description:
You're Stranded! Up cat's creek without a paddle or a boat even! 

Adjustments made: 

  • Reworked all sprites and art to fit my theme. 
    • Player
    • All Enemies
    • All Projectiles 
    • Backgrounds
    • Barriers. 
  • Changed all sound effects and music (it's really bad but I tried to make it fun) 
  • Gave the player a goal and tried to make a small story. 
  • Drew a theme friendly image for the Main Menu. 

I used a free font that I found here https://blogfonts.com/seaworthy.font in order fit with the general Aesthetic of the game.
